am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium.c File Reference

Driver for Raydium display panels with DSI interface (RM67162, RM69330, RM69090). More...

Detailed Description

Driver for Raydium display panels with DSI interface (RM67162, RM69330, RM69090).

#include "am_devices_dc_dsi_raydium.h"
#include "am_util_delay.h"
#include "am_bsp.h"
#include "am_util.h"
